items.text: length ball, comes out of his crease and defends it towards short midwicket
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: goes for the slog sweep but there is deep square leg in place, one bounce to the fielder
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Only twice before two Bangladesh batsmen have got a hundred in the same ODI innings. Can this be the third occasion? A quiz question: which were those two games?
items.text: fuller on stumps pushed back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: down the track and it's another maximum, reaches the pitch of the ball and lofts it over deep midwicket for his fifth six of the innings
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: on the pads this time and helped towards short fine leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: short of length outside off, goes back and punches it towards deep backward point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: and again! Charges down and takes it on full and launches it over deep midwicket, 92 meters this one, 14 off the over so far
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, pushed towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText:
AnamBMDF: "2 centuries in 1 innings: Shakib and Mahmudullah vs. NZ. Another one ?!"

SHAHED MASUM: "Mushi and Tamim vs Pakistan and Sakib and Mahmudullah vs NZ" -- That's correct
items.text: length ball, comes forward and punches it towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: H Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, backs away and hits it towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: H Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: H Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, a free-flowing drive towards sweeper cover but only a single
items.shortText: H Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, looks to drive but gets a thick outside edge towards short third man
items.shortText: H Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: finally gets one wrong, looks to clear long-on but couldn't get under the ball completely and the long-on takes a good overhead catch tumbling on his back
items.postText:
KGhosh: "Ans of the quiz: 1) first one against against Pak in 2015 and 2) against NZ in 2017" -- A lot of people got it right, including KGhosh

SHAHED MASUM: "Am I correct? What's my prize!" -- What can be a bigger prize than a 3-0 win which looks imminent now
items.shortText: H Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, OUT

dismissal.text: Soumya Sarkar c Tiripano b H Masakadza 117 (92b 9x4 6x6) SR: 127.17

items.preText:
Trihan: "Makes a huge positive impact on the batting line up when Soumya gets going. I remember how well he played against South Africa back in 2015. Should really try and tune him up for the world cup!"

AnamBMDF: "Good for Imrul to get 127*! COME ON....."
items.text: length ball, on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg for a couple
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: fuller on stumps, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.preText: REZAUL KARIM: "Honestly, I am happy that they are winning 3-0 here, but I would like Bangladesh to dominate more stronger oppositions like India, SA, AUS, Eng and try to invite them more for bilateral series."
items.text: length ball, goes back and works it to the right of short fine leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and defends it towards point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fuller on stumps, driven inside out towards long-off
items.postText:
Shafayet: "Now Kayes got the chance to make 127"

Zahid: "maybe with sarkar gone, Imrul got a real chance to break babar's record?"
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: down the leg side and misses everyone, the short fine leg fielder chases it all the way and pulls it just inside. The batsmen collect three, meanwhile
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 4 wides

items.text: fuller on stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: and no-ball, pushed on the leg side for a single but once again replays show the bowler had some part of his foot behind the line
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: short of length, fired in, pulled away towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, angling in, backs away and pushes it towards extra cover
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
